    • Method Detail

      • smooth

        public static float smooth(float x)
        Translates a value in a (0,1) range to a value in the same range with smooth ease in and ease out. 0, 0.5 and 1 returns the same but 0.25 returns 0.11 and 0.75 return 0.89
        Parameters:
        x - Float clamped from 0 to 1
        Returns:
        Smoothed float value

      • arbitrarySmooth

        public static float arbitrarySmooth(float x,
                                    float min,
                                    float max)
        Translates a value in a (min,max) range to a value in the same range with smooth ease in and ease out.
        Parameters:
        x - Float clamped from min to max
        min - minimal range value
        max - maximal range value
        Returns:
        smoothed float value in that range

      • offsetToRange

        public static float offsetToRange(float x,
                                  float min,
                                  float max)
        Translates a value from a (0,1) range to a value in a (min,max) range.
        Parameters:
        x - Float clamped from 0 to 1
        min - new range minimal value
        max - new range maximal value
        Returns:
        float value in the new range

      • normalizeRange

        public static float normalizeRange(float x,
                                   float start,
                                   float end)
        Translates a value in a (start,end) range into a value in a (0,1) range.
        Parameters:
        x - Float clamped from 0 to 1
        start - new range minimal value
        end - new range maximal value
        Returns:
        float value in the new range

      • smoothNormalizeRange

        public static float smoothNormalizeRange(float x,
                                         float start,
                                         float end)
        Translates a value from a (start,end) range into a value in a (0,1) range with smooth ease in and ease out. Allows to segment the value of a timer or an effect level into different shorter sliders
        Parameters:
        x - Float clamped from 0 to 1
        start - new range minimal value
        end - new range maximal value
        Returns:
        smoothed float value in the new range

      • smoothToRange

        public static float smoothToRange(float x,
                                  float fromMin,
                                  float fromMax,
                                  float toMin,
                                  float toMax)
        Translates a value from a (fromMin,fromMax) range into a value in a (toMin,toMax) range with smooth ease in and ease out. Allows to segment the value of a timer or an effect level into different shorter sliders
        Parameters:
        x -
        fromMin -
        fromMax -
        toMin -
        toMax -
        Returns:
        smoothed float value clamped at the from range, into the new range

      • smoothReturnNormalizeRange

        public static float smoothReturnNormalizeRange(float x,
                                               float start,
                                               float end)
        Translates a value in a (start,end) range into a "back-and-forth" value in a (0,1) range with smooth ease in and ease out.
        Parameters:
        x - Float clamped from start to end
        start - range minimal value
        end - range maximal value
        Returns:
        smooth "back-and-forth" float value equals to 0 at start and end, and 1 at the mid-point between them

      • smoothReturnToRange

        public static float smoothReturnToRange(float x,
                                        float fromMin,
                                        float fromMax,
                                        float toMin,
                                        float toMax)
        Translates a value in a (fromMin,fromMax) range into a "back-and-forth" value in a (toMin,toMax) range with smooth ease in and ease out.
        Parameters:
        x -
        fromMin -
        fromMax -
        toMin -
        toMax -
        Returns:
        smooth "back-and-forth" float value equals to toMin at start and toMin, and toMax at the mid-point between the (fromMin, fromMax) range

      • cycle

        public static float cycle(float x,
                          float min,
                          float max)
        Cycle within range Restricts a value to a cycling range, produces a seesaw.
        Parameters:
        x - Float
        min - cycle minimal value
        max - cycle maximal value
        Returns:
        "seesaw" value that cycles within the (min,max) range
